description: The Purity Hub Auto H-75 is a fully automatic, high-performance hybrid filtration system that intelligently combines carbon and sand filtration with a water softener to deliver comprehensive water purification. Unlike traditional setups that require two separate multiport valves, the Auto H-75 is uniquely engineered to function with a single, specially designed multiport valve that controls both the carbon and sand filters, along with the water softener—eliminating the need for dual valves. This innovation not only reduces plumbing complexity and system cost but also significantly saves water during cleaning and regeneration cycles by optimizing flow and cycle efficiency. The multiport valve is built using hard-sealing ceramic discs, fired at extreme temperatures between 1680°C to 2200°C, making it highly durable, corrosion-resistant, and maintenance-free over the long term. The system is preloaded with premium-grade sand and carbon media, along with 15% cross-linked ion exchange resin for maximum filtration and softening performance. To further enhance reliability, it includes weather-resistant wiring capable of withstanding heat, rain, and cold, and features tool-free push-fit brine connections for hassle-free installation. Advanced functionalities such as Purity Hub’s patented Low Salt Alarm, Smart Info Panel, LP-BFT (Low Pressure – Before Tank) safety mechanism, and a dual-function regeneration and pressure pump make the Auto H-75 a compact, eco-efficient, and intelligently designed solution for modern water treatment needs.

features: Purity Hub Hybrid I-75 Product Features

1. Advanced Dual Multiport Valve System with Intelligent InterlockingThe Hybrid I-75 features two dedicated multiport valves to independently manage the Carbon & Sand Filter and the Water Softener. This dual system is specifically designed to handle high turbidity levels in water, allowing frequent backwashing of the Carbon and Sand filters without affecting the softener cycle. Both MPVs are engineered with high-durability ceramic moving and fixed discs and can operate under pressure with minimal maintenance. The integrated Purity Hub Interlocking System ensures that only one unit undergoes backwashing or regeneration at a time each valve checks the status of the other before initiating its cleaning cycle, guaranteeing optimal water availability.Hybrid I-75

2. Integrated Equipment for Cost & Maintenance EfficiencyBoth MPVs (for filter and softener) share core components like vacuum breakers, pressure gauges, electronic ball valves, and a single regeneration/backwash motor. This unified system significantly reduces installation costs and long-term maintenance needs
3. Complete Water WorkstationEffectively removes dust, mud, odor, and water hardness. This all-in-one unit can be upgraded anytime, making it a future-ready water treatment solution.Hybrid I-75,
4. Time & Volume-Based Backwash and RegenerationCustomizable cleaning cycles based on water usage or preset time intervals, providing adaptability across different use cases. ( )
5. High Flow Rate 4000 Litres/HourSupports up to 4000 LPH, easily compatible with standard 1-inch plumbing lines.4000 1
6. Inbuilt Patented Low Salt Alarm SystemOur proprietary sensor technology alerts users automatically when brine salt is low, ensuring uninterrupted softening and timely salt refills
7. All-Weather ProtectionAll key components including MPVs, motors, and adaptors are enclosed in protective plastic & metal covers, ensuring long life in heat, rain, or dust

8. Salt Regeneration Safety with LP-BFT (Low Pressure Before Tank)This intelligent feature prevents regeneration if water pressure is insufficient, resuming automatically when water is available ensuring only soft water enters your tank
9. 100-Litre Large Brine Tank (Expandable)Includes a spacious brine tank to store more salt for longer periods. Custom size upgrades available on request.100
10. Integrated MPV-Driven Regeneration MotorComes with an inbuilt motor to automate the regeneration process no need to manually operate borewell or sump motors
11. Smart Cleaning Circuit by Purity HubIf the regeneration motor doesn t receive water, the Smart Circuit will automatically switch on the sump/bore motor ensuring never a dry regeneration cycle.

12. Smart Ball-Valve Integration for Dual UsageOffers flexibility to use the regeneration motor as a pressure pump or to use your existing high-pressure pump as the regeneration motor a first-in-industry innovation

13. World-Class Water Treatment Display PanelA multilingual panel that provides real-time insights adapter status, cleaning schedules, low salt alerts, and direct salt ordering options via integrated helpline
description:
The Purity Hub Hybrid I-75 is a fully automatic, high-performance hybrid filtration system that combines carbon and sand filtration with a water softener to deliver complete and efficient water purification. Unlike Purity Hub Hybrid Single Valve Models, the Hybrid I-75 is designed with two dedicated multiport valves—one for the Carbon & Sand Filter and the other exclusively for the Softener. This intelligent separation is essential because carbon and sand media require frequent backwashing, especially in high-turbidity water conditions, whereas the softener’s resin regeneration is based on Output-Based Regeneration (OBR). By keeping the softener cycle isolated, the system ensures accurate resin regeneration while allowing independent and timely backwashing of the filters.

Both multiport valves are crafted with hard-sealing ceramic discs, fired at extreme temperatures between 1680°C to 2200°C, offering unmatched durability, corrosion resistance, and near-zero maintenance. Additionally, the two valves are smartly interlocked—each valve checks the operational status of the other before initiating its cleaning cycle. This intelligent interlocking system ensures that the Carbon & Sand Filter backwash or Resin Regeneration only begins when adequate water is available, preventing pressure drops and enhancing overall system efficiency.

The system comes preloaded with premium-grade sand and carbon media, along with 15% cross-linked ion exchange resin, ensuring superior filtration and softening performance. Engineered for Indian weather conditions, it includes weather-resistant wiring, tool-free push-fit brine pipe connections, Purity Hub’s patented Low Salt Alarm, a Smart Info Panel, LP-BFT (Low Pressure – Before Tank) technology, and a dual-function regeneration and pressure pump—making the Hybrid I-75 a powerful, eco-efficient, and smart water treatment solution built for long-term reliability.

description: The Purity Hub Auto Z-75 is a fully automatic, intelligently engineered hybrid water softener that combines advanced softening technology with 5-micron precision filtration using special glass media—offering superior clarity and protection from fine particles. Unlike conventional setups that require two separate multiport valves, the Auto Z-75 uses a single, specially designed multiport valve to manage both filtration and softening functions, significantly reducing plumbing complexity, cost, and water wastage during regeneration. The valve is built with high-strength ceramic discs, fired at extreme temperatures (1680°C to 2200°C), ensuring long-term durability and corrosion resistance. The system comes preloaded with 15% cross-linked ion exchange resin for enhanced hardness removal and is equipped with weatherproof wiring, push-fit brine connectors for tool-free installation, and smart automation features. These include Purity Hub’s patented Low Salt Alarm, a real-time Smart Info Panel, the LP-BFT safety system to prevent dry regeneration, and a dual-function pump interface that allows the regeneration motor to double as a pressure pump. Compact, eco-efficient, and reliable, the Auto Z-75 is a next-generation solution for homes and communities seeking high-performance water purification in a single intelligent unit.

description:
The Purity Hub Auto S-50 is a fully automatic, high-efficiency water softener engineered for both residential and commercial applications. Designed to adapt to diverse water consumption patterns, it features intelligent volumetric and time-based regeneration settings to ensure uninterrupted and optimized performance. At its core is a programmable digital display multiport valve that offers user-friendly control, while integrated safety features such as LP BFT (Low Pressure – Before Tank) and Smart Regeneration IC enhance operational reliability, especially during regeneration cycles.

The system is equipped with a high-quality brine tank that includes Purity Hub’s patented Low Salt Alarm, alerting users to timely salt refilling for uninterrupted softening efficiency. Built with 15% cross-linked, high-performance resin, the Auto S-50 ensures effective softening while using soft water for regeneration, enabled through its inbuilt regeneration motor, thereby extending the resin life and maintaining consistent water quality.

Purity Hub’s multiport valve is specially engineered with hard-sealing ceramic discs, fired at extreme temperatures ranging from 1680°C to 2200°C. This results in outstanding durability, corrosion resistance, and minimal wear—even under prolonged use. Additionally, weather-resistant wiring is used throughout the system to withstand extreme Indian weather conditions, including intense heat, rain, and cold. The brine pipe fittings are designed as push-fit connectors, allowing for quick, tool-free installation and maintenance, eliminating the complications associated with threaded fittings.

Altogether, the Auto S-50 is a robust, intelligent, and user-centric water softener solution, delivering long-lasting performance and consistently soft, clean water across a wide range of usage environments.

features: Purity Hub Auto S-150S Product Features
1. Fully Automatic, 100% Touchless RegenerationThe Auto S-150S automatically performs regeneration based on water usage or time without any manual motor operation or user intervention.Auto S-150S
2. Dual Regeneration Technology Time & Volume BasedThis smart system ensures efficient performance through dual-mode regeneration, activating automatically based on time elapsed or water volume used

3. Ultra High Flow Rate 8000 Litres/HourSpecially designed for community-level applications, Auto S-150S delivers up to 8000 litres per hour ideal for apartment complexes, villas, societies, or institutions.Auto S-150S 8000
4. Patented Inbuilt Low Salt Alarm SystemWith Purity Hub s proprietary alarm system, you get notified the moment salt levels in the brine tank are low preventing system failure or hard water supply
5. Rugged All-Weather ProtectionEach critical component multiport valve, adapter, and motor is protected with heavy-duty plastic and metal covers for long-lasting outdoor performance

6. LP-BFT Salt Protection SystemThe advanced LP-BFT (Low Pressure Before Tank) mechanism ensures regeneration only begins if sufficient water is available in the line pausing if water is low and resuming automatically when restored
7. Extra-Large 200-Litre Brine TankWith a 200-litre brine tank, the Auto S-150S supports extended runtime with minimal salt refilling needs ideal for high-consumption environments.200
8. Integrated MPV-Operated Regeneration MotorThe built-in motor activates automatically during cleaning cycles, so you don t have to switch on borewell or submersible motors manually.

9. Intelligent Smart Regeneration CircuitIf water is not detected during regeneration, the smart circuit will automatically start the submersible or borewell pump ensuring no regeneration failure ever occurs
10. Dual Function Ball-Valve IntegrationWhether it's a high-pressure pump or a standard one this smart valve lets your pump work both as a pressure pump and a regeneration motor

11. Most Advanced Water Softener Control PanelAuto S-150S features the world s most advanced control panel showing power status, regeneration alerts, low salt warnings, and water flow alerts. It even includes a direct call option to reorder salt.Auto S-150S
description:
The Purity Hub Auto S-150S is a fully automatic, high-capacity water softener designed specifically for community and large-scale applications. Built for performance and reliability, it operates on both volumetric and time-based regeneration settings, ensuring optimized softening even under fluctuating water demand. At the heart of the system is a programmable digital display high-flow multiport valve, capable of handling an impressive flow rate of 8000 litres per hour, making it ideal for residential societies, institutions, commercial complexes, and industrial utilities.

For enhanced safety and consistency, the system includes LP BFT (Low Pressure – Before Tank) and Smart Regeneration IC that monitor water availability and ensure that the regeneration process proceeds only under proper conditions. The premium brine tank is integrated with Purity Hub’s patented Low Salt Alarm, providing timely alerts for salt replenishment—helping maintain uninterrupted operation with minimal manual oversight.

The system’s softening efficiency is powered by 15% cross-linked, high-performance Purity Hub resin, which regenerates using soft water through its inbuilt regeneration motor, ensuring extended resin life and consistently high water quality.

Engineered for long-term durability and environmental exposure, the multiport valve is crafted with hard-sealing ceramic discs, fired at extreme temperatures ranging from 1680°C to 2200°C, providing outstanding resistance to corrosion, erosion, and wear—even during continuous use. The electrical components are wired using weather-resistant cabling, tested to withstand India’s extreme climatic conditions—from intense heat and monsoons to cold winters. Additionally, brine pipe fittings are designed with tool-free push-fit connectors, eliminating the complications of threaded joints and ensuring smooth, leak-proof installation and maintenance.

Altogether, the Auto S-150S represents the pinnacle of Purity Hub’s intelligent water treatment engineering—delivering dependable, high-volume softening with advanced automation, minimal maintenance, and long-term operational efficiency.

description: The Purity Hub Kinetic S-150 is a fully automatic, dual-tank continuous flow water softener designed for industrial, commercial, and bulk residential applications requiring 24/7 uninterrupted soft water. Engineered to deliver a high output of 4000 LPH, it ensures seamless operation by alternating between two softening tanks—while one tank regenerates, the other remains in service, guaranteeing a constant supply of softened water. At its core is an advanced digital multiport valve with programmable settings for intelligent flow management and automatic regeneration cycles, optimized for high-volume usage. The system features a heavy-duty brine tank integrated with Purity Hub’s patented Low Salt Alarm for timely refilling, while its inbuilt booster pump ensures consistent pressure across diverse applications. Built with premium 15% cross-linked resin, the Kinetic S-150 provides superior ion-exchange efficiency, extended resin life, and consistent water quality even under peak demand. Its robust construction includes hard-sealing ceramic discs, precision-fired at extreme temperatures (1680°C–2200°C) for unmatched durability, corrosion resistance, and minimal wear. To withstand harsh Indian climatic conditions, the system is equipped with weather-resistant wiring, while the push-fit brine fittings allow quick, tool-free maintenance. Altogether, the Kinetic S-150 represents the next generation of large-capacity water softening—reliable, intelligent, and built for continuous performance in demanding environments such as hotels, hospitals, factories, and apartment complexes.

description: The Purity Hub Electronic Valve [3WDN25] is a highly durable and versatile solution engineered for use across industries such as agriculture, water treatment, and farming. Featuring an IC-based control circuit, the valve electronically regulates water flow according to programmed time frames and user commands, enabling precise and automated fluid control. Designed for tough environments, it holds an IP65 rating for resistance to dust and rain, and offers flexible installation options—either horizontally or vertically. Built to last, the valve is capable of over 1 lakh operations, ensuring a long and reliable service life. Its PPO body construction allows it to perform efficiently in humid conditions, while the ceramic valve core is compatible with a wide range of media, including water, air, oil, acidic and alkaline fluids, as well as low-viscosity chemicals, making it an ideal choice for diverse industrial applications.

name: vacuum-breaker-and-air-release-valve-for-water-softeners-2
description: A vacuum breaker is a vital component of any pressure vessel, designed to protect the system from damage caused by vacuum conditions. It prevents breakage and deformation by allowing air to enter the vessel when negative pressure is detected, thereby maintaining structural integrity. Specifically, it supplies air to the raw water motor from the surrounding environment, ensuring smooth and safe operation. Mechanically operated and maintenance-free after installation, the vacuum breaker offers a reliable, hassle-free solution for safeguarding pressure vessels.

name: salt-suction-brine-pipe-for-water-softeners-yellow-10-mm-x-6-5-mm-1-meter-2
description: A salt suction pipe is an essential component of any water softener, as it enables the proper intake of salt during the regeneration process. If the pipe breaks or malfunctions, the system cannot draw salt, leading to ineffective water softening. Purity Hub offers a high-quality PU salt suction pipe designed for durability and performance. With a smooth fit and finish, it is highly resistant to wear and tear, ensuring a long service life and consistent functionality for your water softener.
